actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sila makes four Cold-Infused Jambiya or Water Burst attacks. If two Water Burst attacks hit one creature, the target must succeed on a DC 17 STR save or be pushed up to 15 feet away from the sila.

actions.name: Cold-Infused Jambiya
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 14 (2d8+5) slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Water Burst
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +9 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 19 (4d6+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Create Water Elemental (1/Day)
actions.desc: The sila magically creates one water-based Elemental of CR 5 or lower in an unoccupied space the sila can see within 30 feet of it. The elemental acts as an ally of the sila, obeying its spoken commands. The elemental remains for 1 hour, until the sila dies, or until the sila dismisses it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Travel the Planes (1/Day)
actions.desc: The sila transports itself to a different plane of existence. This works like the plane shift spell, except it can affect only itself and can't use this action to banish an unwilling creature.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The sila can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Fluid Body (Bipedal Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: The sila can move through the space of any creature, regardless of size, and a creature of any size can move through a sila's space. In addition, the sila can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Nebulous (Cloud Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: The sila's Stealth is 21, it can hover while flying, can't manipulate objects or attack, and it can pass through any space air or water can pass through without squeezing. In addition, it can enter and hide in any Tiny or larger container, such as a pouch, lamp, backpack, or barrel.
